question: Which of the following statements are incorrect with respect to Fundamental Duties?
option1: They can be promoted only by constitutional methods
option2: They can used for interpreting ambiguous statutes
option3: They can be enforced by writs
option4: The performance of any particular duty comes within the sphere of constitutional law which court has to decide
answer: They can be enforced by writs
explanation: The Fundamental Duties cannot be enforced by writs. They have been defined as the moral obligations of all the citizens to help, promote a spirit of patriotism and to uphold the unity of India.
